nodes.text: The Souma were a species of sentient felines hailing from the planet Soum. Their whole bodies were covered with a thick coat of fur, and they had gentle, frank-looking eyes. The Souma species had a 1-to-5 male-to-female ratio. Compared to females, the male Souma were considered intellectually challenged. As such, they were usually relegated to menial tasks.
The businesswoman Triaz Kirr, director of the Kirr Ltd. and co-founder of the Tlan-Kirr network during the Galactic Civil War, was a female Souma.
The Souma only appeared in Les démons de feu, a roleplaying adventure published in the 25th issue of French gaming magazine Graal.
